   19: %%
   20: %% Originally based on Per Gustafsson's test suite.
   21: %%
   22: 
   23: -module(mc_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: -export([all/0,suite/0,init_per_suite/1,end_per_suite/1,
   26:          init_per_testcase/2,end_per_testcase/2,
   27: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   28:          basic/1,duplicate_keys/1,mixed/1,
   29:          shadow/1,bad_generators/1]).
   30: 
   31: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   32: 
   33: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   34: 
   35: all() ->
   36:     [basic,
   37:      duplicate_keys,
   38:      mixed,
   39:      shadow,
   40:      bad_generators].
   41: 
   42: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   43:     test_lib:interpret(?MODULE),
   44:     true = lists:member(?MODULE, int:interpreted()),
   45:     Config.
   46: 
   47: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   48:     ok.
   49: 
   50: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   51:     test_lib:interpret(?MODULE),
   52:     Config.
   53: 
   54: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   55:     ok.
   56: 
   57: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   58:     Config.
   59: 
   60: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   61:     Config.
   62: 
   63: -record(foo, {a,b}).
   64: 
   65: basic(_Config) ->
   66:     mc_double(0),
   67:     mc_double(1),
   68:     mc_double(2),
   69:     mc_double(3),
   70:     mc_double(4),
   71:     mc_double(5),
   72: 
   73:     mc_double(17),
   74:     mc_double(18),
   75:     mc_double(19),
   76: 
   77:     mc_double(30),
   78:     mc_double(31),
   79:     mc_double(32),
   80:     mc_double(33),
   81:     mc_double(34),
   82: 
   83:     mc_double(63),
   84:     mc_double(64),
   85:     mc_double(65),
   86: 
   87:     mc_double(77),
   88:     mc_double(127),
   89:     mc_double(128),
   90:     mc_double(255),
   91:     mc_double(333),
   92:     mc_double(444),
   93: 
   94:     %% Patterns that cannot possibly match.
   95:     #{} = #{K => V || K := [V]={V} <- id(#{a => [b]})},
   96:     #{} = #{K => V || [K] = 42 := V <- id(#{42 => whatever})},
   97: 
   98:     %% Filtering.
   99:     Map = #{{a,1} => {a,b,c}, {b,42} => [1,2,3], c => [4,5,6], d => {x,y}},
  100:     [c, d] = lists:sort([K || K := _ <- Map, is_atom(K)]),
  101:     [{a,b,c}, [1,2,3]] = lists:sort([V || {_,_} := V <- Map]),
  102:     [1] = [H || {_,_} := [H|_] <- Map],
  103:     [c, {b,42}] = lists:sort([K || K := [_|_] <- Map]),
  104: 
  105:     %% Filtering using literal patterns.
  106:     [] = [0 || a := b <- #{}],
  107:     [] = [0 || a := b <- #{x => y}],
  108:     [0] = [0 || a := b <- #{a => b}],
  109: 
  110:     <<>> = << <<0>> || a := b <- #{} >>,
  111:     <<>> = << <<0>> || a := b <- #{x => y} >>,
  112:     <<0>> = << <<0>> || a := b <- #{a => b} >>,
  113: 
  114:     %% Matching partial records.
  115:     RecordMap = id(#{#foo{a=I,b=I*I} => I*I*I || I <- [1,2,3,4]}),
  116: 
  117:     EvenMap = maps:from_list([{K,V} ||
  118:                                  {#foo{a=N}=K,V} <- maps:to_list(RecordMap),
  119:                                  N rem 2 =:= 0]),
  120:     EvenMap = #{K => V ||
  121:                   #foo{a=N}=K := V <- RecordMap,
  122:                   N rem 2 =:= 0},
  123: 
  124:     Odd = lists:sort([V || {#foo{a=N}, V} <- maps:to_list(RecordMap),
  125:                            N rem 2 =:= 1]),
  126:     Odd = lists:sort([V || #foo{a=N} := V <- RecordMap, N rem 2 =:= 1]),
  127: 
  128:     %% Strict generators (each generator type)
  129:     #{1 := 2, 2 := 3, 3 := 4} = #{X => X+1 || X <:- [1,2,3]},
  130:     #{1 := 2, 2 := 3, 3 := 4} = #{X => X+1 || <<X>> <:= <<1,2,3>>},
  131:     #{2 := 4, 4 := 8} = #{X+1 => Y*2 || X := Y <:- #{1 => 2, 3 => 4}},
  132: 
  133:     %% A failing guard following a strict generator is ok
  134:     #{2 := 3, 3 := 4} = #{X => X+1 || X <:- [1,2,3], X > 1},
  135:     #{2 := 3, 3 := 4} = #{X => X+1 || <<X>> <:= <<1,2,3>>, X > 1},
  136:     #{4 := 8} = #{X+1 => Y*2 || X := Y <:- #{1 => 2, 3 => 4}, X > 1},
  137: 
  138:     %% Non-matching elements cause a badmatch error for strict generators
  139:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,2},_}} = (catch #{X => X+1 || {ok, X} <:- [{ok,1},2,{ok,3}]}),
  140:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,<<128,2>>},_}} = (catch #{X => X+1 || <<0:1, X:7>> <:= <<1,128,2>>}),
  141:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,{2,error}},_}} = (catch #{X => X+1 || X := ok <:- #{1 => ok, 2 => error, 3 => ok}}),
  142: 
  143:     ok.
  144: 
  145: mc_double(Size) ->
  146:     Seq = lists:seq(1, Size),
  147:     Map = #{{key,I} => I || I <- Seq},
  148: 
  149:     MapDouble = #{K => 2 * V || K := V <- id(Map)},
  150:     MapDouble = maps:from_list([{{key,I}, 2 * I} || I <- Seq]),
  151: 
  152:     OddKeys = lists:seq(1, Size, 2),
  153:     OddKeys = lists:sort([I || {key,I} := I <- Map,
  154:                                I rem 2 =/= 0]),
  155: 
  156:     OddMap = #{I => [] || {key,I} := I <- Map,
  157:                           I rem 2 =/= 0},
  158:     OddMap = #{I => [] || {key,I} := I <- Map,
  159:                           id(I) rem 2 =/= 0},
  160:     OddKeys = lists:sort(maps:keys(OddMap)),
  161: 
  162:     %% Test that map comprehensions works on iterators.
  163:     test_iterator(Map, 0),
  164:     test_iterator(Map, map_size(Map) div 3),
  165:     test_iterator(Map, map_size(Map) div 2),
  166:     test_iterator(Map, map_size(Map)),
  167: 
  168:     ok.
  169: 
  170: test_iterator(Map, N) ->
  171:     Iter0 = maps:iterator(Map),
  172:     {First,Iter} = grab(N, Iter0, []),
  173:     All = [{K,V} || K := V <- Iter] ++ First,
  174:     Map = maps:from_list(All),
  175:     ok.
  176: 
  177: grab(0, Iter, Acc) ->
  178:     {Acc,Iter};
  179: grab(N, Iter0, Acc) ->
  180:     case maps:next(Iter0) of
  181:         none ->
  182:             {Acc,Iter0};
  183:         {K,V,Iter} ->
  184:             grab(N - 1, Iter, [{K,V}|Acc])
  185:     end.
  186: 
  187: duplicate_keys(_Config) ->
  188:     #{x := b} = #{V => K || {K,V} <- [{a, x}, {b, x}]},
  189: 
  190:     #{a := 4, b := 4} =
  191:         #{K => V || K <- [a,b],
  192:                     <<V>> <= <<1,2,3,4>>},
  193:     ok.
  194: 
  195: mixed(_Config) ->
  196:     Map = id(#{1 => 10, 2 => 5, 3 => 88, 4 => 99, 5 => 36}),
  197:     Bin = << <<K:8,V:24>> || K := V <- Map >>,
  198:     Map = maps:from_list([{K,V} || <<K:8,V:24>> <= Bin]),
  199: 
  200:     Atoms = [list_to_atom([C]) || C <- lists:seq($a, $z)],
  201:     Integers = lists:seq(1, 64),
  202: 
  203:     mixed_1(Atoms, Integers),
  204:     mixed_2(Atoms, Integers),
  205:     mixed_3(Atoms, Integers),
  206: 
  207:     sum_of_triangular_numbers(7),
  208:     sum_of_triangular_numbers(10),
  209: 
  210:     ok.
  211: 
  212: mixed_1(Atoms, Integers) ->
  213:     IntegerMap = #{N => [] || N <- Integers},
  214:     IntegerKeys = [N || N := [] <- IntegerMap],
  215:     Integers = lists:sort(IntegerKeys),
  216:     Combined = [{C,N} || C <- Atoms, N := [] <- IntegerMap],
  217:     Combined = [{C,N} || C <- Atoms, N := [] <- maps:iterator(IntegerMap)],
  218:     Combined = [{C,N} || C <- Atoms, N <- IntegerKeys],
  219: 
  220:     ok.
  221: 
  222: mixed_2(Atoms, Integers) ->
  223:     IntegerMap = #{N => [] || N <- Integers},
  224:     IntegerKeys = [N || N := [] <- IntegerMap],
  225:     Bin = << <<N:16>> || N := [] <- IntegerMap >>,
  226:     Integers = lists:sort(IntegerKeys),
  227: 
  228:     Combined = [{C,N} || N := [] <- IntegerMap, C <- Atoms],
  229:     Combined = [{C,N} || N := [] <- maps:iterator(IntegerMap), C <- Atoms],
  230:     Combined = [{C,N} || <<N:16>> <= Bin, C <- Atoms],
  231:     Combined = [{C,N} || N <- IntegerKeys, C <- Atoms],
  232: 
  233:     ok.
  234: 
  235: mixed_3(Atoms, Integers) ->
  236:     Map = #{K => V || {K,V} <- lists:zip(Atoms, Integers, trim)},
  237:     Bin = << <<N:16>> || _ := N <- Map >>,
  238:     {TrimmedAtoms,TrimmedIntegers} = lists:unzip([{K,V} || K := V <- Map]),
  239: 
  240:     Combined = lists:sort([{K,V} || K := _ <- Map, _ := V <- Map]),
  241:     Combined = lists:sort([{K,V} || K <- TrimmedAtoms, <<V:16>> <= Bin]),
  242:     Combined = lists:sort([{K,V} || K <- TrimmedAtoms, V <- TrimmedIntegers]),
  243: 
  244:     ok.
  245: 
  246: sum_of_triangular_numbers(N) ->
  247:     Sum = N * (N + 1) * (N + 2) div 6,
  248:     Maps = [#{I => I || I <- lists:seq(0, I)} || I <- lists:seq(0, N)],
  249:     Numbers = [I || M <- Maps, I := I <- M],
  250:     Numbers = lists:flatten([[I || I := I <- M] || M <- Maps]),
  251:     Sum = lists:sum([lists:sum([I || I := I <- M]) || M <- Maps]),
  252:     Sum = lists:sum(Numbers),
  253:     ok.
  254: 
  255: shadow(_Config)->
  256:     Shadowed = nomatch,
  257:     _ = id(Shadowed),				%Eliminate warning.
  258:     Map = #{Shadowed => Shadowed+1 || Shadowed <- lists:seq(7, 9)},
  259:     #{7 := 8, 8 := 9, 9 := 10} = id(Map),
  260:     [8,9] = lists:sort([Shadowed || _ := Shadowed <- id(Map),
  261:                                     Shadowed < 10]),
  262:     ok.
  263: 
  264: bad_generators(_Config) ->
  265:     %% Make sure that line numbers point out the generator.
  266:     case ?MODULE of
  267:         mc_inline_SUITE ->
  268:             ok;
  269:         _ ->
  270:             {'EXIT',{{bad_generator,a},
  271:                      [{?MODULE,_,_,_}|_]}} =
  272:                 catch id(bad_generator(a)),
  273: 
  274:             {'EXIT',{{bad_generator,a},
  275:                      [{?MODULE,_,_,_}|_]}} =
  276:                 catch id(bad_generator_bc(a)),
  277: 
  278:             {'EXIT',{{bad_generator,a},
  279:                      [{?MODULE,_,_,_}|_]}} =
  280:                 catch id(bad_generator_mc(a)),
  281: 
  282:             BadIterator = [16#ffff|#{}],
  283: 
  284:             {'EXIT',{{bad_generator,BadIterator},
  285:                      [{?MODULE,_,_,_}|_]}} =
  286:                 catch id(bad_generator(BadIterator)),
  287: 
  288:             {'EXIT',{{bad_generator,BadIterator},
  289:                      [{?MODULE,_,_,_}|_]}} =
  290:                 catch id(bad_generator_bc(BadIterator)),
  291: 
  292:             {'EXIT',{{bad_generator,BadIterator},
  293:                      [{?MODULE,_,_,_}|_]}} =
  294:                 catch id(bad_generator_mc(BadIterator))
  295:     end,
  296:     ok.
  297: 
  298: id(I) -> I.
  299: 
  300: -file("bad_mc.erl", 1).
  301: bad_generator(Map) ->                           %Line 2
  302:     [{K,V} ||                                   %Line 3
  303:         K := V <- Map].                         %Line 4
  304: bad_generator_bc(Map) ->                        %Line 5
  305:     << <<K:8,V:24>> ||                          %Line 6
  306:         K := V <- Map>>.                        %Line 7
  307: bad_generator_mc(Map) ->                        %Line 8
  308:     #{V => K ||                                 %Line 9
  309:         K := V <- Map}.                         %Line 10
